p: The activity of natural killer cells in patients with gynecological cancers undergoing chemotherapy was significantly increased in the verum group treated with Agaricus blazei murill after 3 and 6 weeks compared to placebo ( Ahn et al., 2004). No difference was observed in the number of white blood cells, monocytes, lymphocytes, T cells, cluster of differentiation (CD) 48 + and CD 56 + cells.
